title: Buffer Insert Function
description: This function inserts a specified string into a buffer at a given position, shifting existing data to create space. It returns the next position after the inserted string.
name: _BUFFER_INSERT

input.name: STR
input.description: The string to be inserted into the buffer.

input.name: POS
input.description: The position in the buffer where the string will be inserted.

input.name: PT
input.description: A pointer to the buffer array where the string will be inserted.

return_value.description: The next position in the buffer after the inserted string.
